H0.text: In what capacity did author Ernest Hemingway serve during the First World War. Ambulance Driver

H1.text: In what capacity did author Ernest Hemingway serve during the First World War. Infantry Soldier

H2.text: In what capacity did author Ernest Hemingway serve during the First World War. Nurse

H3.text: In what capacity did author Ernest Hemingway serve during the First World War. EMTs

A4.text: He served as an ambulance driver on the Italian Front in World War I.
